TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You retire from retiring.

I wish the USS exaoe otw. 64 neep.

The Wishmaking Fairy does not recognize your wish as intelligible English and makes you wear fairy clothes.

I wish dough-nuts were flavoured buns without any holes in them. My, I hate nuts.
Granted. Their flavour is antimatter, because they are made of antimatter.

Granted, but you are forbidden to ever make a wish again.

I wish people would not be so careless.

granted so now you are too

I wish that i could build better rockets

granted, with your incredible rocket you go on to make billions of dollars! but then your money crushes and kills you.

I wish I would feel better.

Granted. It costs all your money, your entire social life, and your future. But you feel just fine for the next 15 minutes.

I wish I had a real life rocket.

Granted, but it's only a model.

I wish I could fly.

Granted, but you sell your ability to do so in order to make another wish. This goes on until I can make a wish too. The wings belong to a horse now.

I wish for the colorful dreams!

Granted. You go blind.

I wish for a surfboard.

granted, you are impaled by it

i wish for that i can upload myself into a giant alien computer cloud made of trillions of robots in the far reaches of the universe (read the book rapture of the nerds to know what i mean)

Granted, but the computer's AI outmatches your own and accidentally overcrowds it, merging it into itself.

I wish for more grimdark.

Granted. It becomes mainstream.

I wish for duna to explode.

Granted. The darkness of space eats Kerbin & Duna. That's grim, isn't it?

I wish for myself to be scanned, saved in a .human file, and loaded (with backups) into an abstract world where buttons spawn hydrogen molecules.

Granted. However, .human is unreadable by all systems except your world, including the one which brings you back to reality. You accidentally press the oxygen and fire buttons as well, and your world is consumed by flame.

I wish for terry214!

Granted, but I have no idea what terry214 is (Did you mean danny2462)

So the wish isn't granted.

I wish for...The biggest possible space station ever.

Granted. However, a small rock tips it over and it burns up in the atmosphere.

I wish for a somewhat rule-bending quantum computer that runs at room temperature and has Windows 7 and is compatible with human technology.

Granted. If explodes while you are stress-testing it.

I wish I enjoyed working.

Granted. You love it so much you die of exhaustion.

I wish my wish would be corrupted soon.

Granted. It's soon in the sense of 8 minutes.

I wish for spodr sills.

Granted, but I have no idea what sills are so you get a bunch of spodrs in your room instead.

I wish I knew what spodr sills are.

Granted. You can no longer corrupt my wish.

I wish for 1/11th space with 1/4th time.

Granted. The mathematics cause your brain to burst.

I wish for unlimited knowledge.

Granted. The insane amount of knowledge makes you a celebrity, and some jealous person assassinates you.

I wish for a jellyfish.

Granted. It latches onto your face, and you die of its stings.

I wish I had a steam locomotive.
